record.id: field.name="subscriberType" and file.name="Subscription" and term=NULL and format.name=NULL and syslanguage="en"
record.field.name: subscriberType
record.file.name: Subscription

brief.brief: The type of subscription, either "contacts" (for individual subscriptions) or the name of a table (for group subscriptions).

detail.detail: There are two types of subscriptions:
1. An individual-type subscription has one member subscribing to a CI, and Subscriber Type="contacts".

2. A group-type subscription has more than one member subscribing to the CI, and Subscriber Type=<table name>, where <table name> reflects the name of the table where the group is defined. For example Subscriber Type="dept" indicates that the subscribers to the CI belong to a group defined by a record in the dept table, whose specific name is defined by the Subscriber field.
